name: Duolingo Man (Phase 2)
desc: Found in Japanese Unit 2: Activity 2. Phase 2 of the Duolingo man fight is not commonly encountered, but it is most likely to trigger if you are, in any way, what most would call a no-lifer. Few can resist this rare form's command without being absolutely decimated, and some are even physically incapable of stopping themselves from taking a shower. If you want to skip this fight, the answer is "すぐにシャワーをあびてください。"
author: Ember#0845
